alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; East Carteret; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:44AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Craven, northwestern Hyde, southeastern Beaufort, central Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 415 AM EST... At 343 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blounts Creek to Neuse Forest to Bogue Inlet Pier. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, James City, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Belhaven, Ransomville, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Blounts Creek, Pamlico Beach, Lowland, Cayton, Florence, Broad Creek and Janeiro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; East Carteret; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
